alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Pickens; Tuscaloosa; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:34PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Walker, northern Tuscaloosa, northern Pickens, southwestern Jefferson, southern Fayette and southern Lamar Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 234 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Caledonia to near Gorgas Steam Plant. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bessemer, Fayette, Reform, Millport, Sylvan Springs, Berry, Kennedy, Belk, North Johns, Ethelsville, Gorgas Steam Plant, Bull City, Samantha, Boley Springs, Binion Creek Landing, Bankston, Gorgas, Ashcraft Corner, Concord and Bankhead Lock And Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
